The core module should not link to documentation on a contributed project, this needs some kind of solution, possibly in the core patch script. attachments.title: Announcements Feed
attachments.text: Provides an interface as part of the administrator toolbar for viewing announcements from the Drupal project. The list of announcements is provided from <http://drupal.org|drupal.org> and may provide information about upcoming releases, new feature highlights, events like DrupalCon, and promote support of the project via Association membership or other programs. It was originally developed as the Announce contributed module. There are no settings in the module, the <http://drupal.org|drupal.org> source feed location is built-in. Users may configure which user roles have access to the announcement list in the toolbar.

attachments.title: Remove the link to contrib module doc in help text
attachments.text: Problem/Motivation As a core module the help should not link to a contrib module documentation on d.o Proposed resolution Create a doc page in the core handbook, or find a way to not have to use a link at all. Remaining tasks Find the right solution
